mainAboutCopy: I'm originally from Warrington but currently residing in Bury. I studied Creative Media Technology at Leeds Beckett University before joining PrettyLittleThing in 2016. I enjoy finding the next challenge and staying up to date with the latest technologies. I'm a UX Developer with 8 years industry experience, proficient in technologies such as React, JavaScript/jQuery, Git, Figma & Storybook. Thanks for stopping by!

for the win always! Anyone who says otherwise is kidding themselves!
